projects.title: Build and Deploy a Simple Guestbook App
projects.bodyText:
Built a simple guestbook application using front-end technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Packaged the application using Docker, a popular platform for developing, shipping, and running applications.
Deployed the application using Kubernetes, an open-source platform for automating deployment, scaling, and management of containerized applications.
Managed the application using OpenShift, a family of containerization software developed by Red Hat.

projects.title: Deploy Guestbook App from the OpenShift Internal Registry
projects.bodyText:
Deployed the guestbook application from the OpenShift Internal Registry, a built-in container image registry that is deployed by default with OpenShift.
Managed the application lifecycle, including updates and rollbacks, using OpenShiftâ€™s built-in features.
Ensured the application is scalable and can handle requests efficiently.

projects.title: Microservices based Serverless Application
projects.bodyText:
Designed and architected a full-stack application using microservices.
Developed both front-end and back-end components of the application using technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.
Implemented user management and authentication mechanisms to secure the application.
Developed backend services and established communication with databases.
Utilized CI/CD pipelines for continuous integration and deployment of changes.
Deployed serverless applications on Code Engine.
Created and invoked RESTful microservices.
Deployed the entire solution on the cloud using Kubernetes.

projects.title: Part 1: Front-end Enhancement
projects.bodyText:
Enhanced the user interface of a web application using React, a popular front-end library.
Implemented new features and improved the overall user experience.
Applied best practices for component design and state management.

projects.title: Part 2: Car Inventory Backend Service
projects.bodyText:
Developed a backend service for a car inventory application using Node.js and Express.
Implemented CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations to interact with the car inventory.
Ensured the backend service is scalable and can handle requests efficiently.

projects.title: Part 3: Front-end Development for Car Inventory Service
projects.bodyText:
Connected the front-end application with the backend service, creating a full-stack application.
Utilized React for front-end development to interact with the car inventory backend service.
Ensured seamless data flow between the front-end and the backend, providing a smooth user experience.
